titleInfo.title: ‘File 13/4 Vol. II Application from individuals and Political Agent’s sanction to grant Passport and visa to travellers etc.’

physicalDescription.extent: Foliation: numbered 1 to 23 in pencil in the top right hand corner. The numbering starts at the front of the file, on the first file enclosure (f.1) and ends on the inside cover at the back of the file (f.23).

mods.abstract: The file contains correspondence with several foreign residents in Bahrain, who requested visas, permits or identity certificates for travel to India, Europe or other Arabian countries. The requests were made to the Political Agent, Bahrain by American, British and British Indian subjects.There is also correspondence between the British Political Agency, Bahrain and the Bahrain State Police, concerning travel and identity papers for two persons due to be repatriated to Persia and passports for four sepoys due to travel to India.
